title: MTU Wins National Engineering Competition
description: Our team secured first place in the annual National Engineering Challenge with their innovative solar-powered vehicle design.

title: New Computer Labs Opening Next Semester
description: The CEIT department will unveil 3 new high-performance computing labs equipped with the latest hardware.

title: Research Symposium on Sustainable Energy
description: Join us for presentations on renewable energy innovations from our Electrical Power Engineering faculty.

title: Campus Network Upgrade Scheduled
description: Major network infrastructure improvements will occur this weekend. Expect intermittent outages.

title: Biotechnology Department Partners with Local Hospital
description: New collaboration will focus on medical diagnostics research and student internships.
